CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open - circuit voltages ( V oc ) of 0.70 and 0.72 V , respectively , considering their HOMO levels , -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. POBDTPD - This is a material name, as it refers to a specific type of device or material.
2. PEBDTPD - This is also a material name, as it is a specific type of device or material.
3. HOMO levels - While HOMO is an acronym for "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital," it is not a material name in this context. It is a property or characteristic of the materials POBDTPD and PEBDTPD.

Therefore, the material names in the paragraph are POBDTPD and PEBDTPD.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open - circuit voltages ( V oc ) of 0.70 and 0.72 V , respectively , considering their HOMO levels , -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. "POBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open-circuit voltages (V oc ) of 0.70 V"
* Here, the "Property Value" entity is "0.70 V", which is the measured open-circuit voltage (V oc) of the POBDTPD devices.
2. "PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open-circuit voltages (V oc ) of 0.72 V"
* Here, the "Property Value" entity is "0.72 V", which is the measured open-circuit voltage (V oc) of the PEBDTPD devices.
3. "considering their HOMO levels, -5.23 and -5.37 eV, respectively."
* Here, the "Property Value" entities are "-5.23 eV" and "-5.37 eV", which are the HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) levels of the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices, respectively.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "0.70 V", "0.72 V", "-5.23 eV", and "-5.37 eV".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

* Here, the relevant "Property Value" entity is "0.72 V", which is the measured open-circuit voltage (V oc) of the PEBDTPD devices.

* Here, the relevant "Property Value" entities are "-5.23 eV" and "-5.37 eV", which are the HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) levels of the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices, respectively.
